dc:title: On Pilgrimage - January 1947
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: The story of a poor family--a pregnant wife and her drug addicted husband--that elicits the prayer "Dear God, help us to increase in holy hope." Reports that Peter Maurin will spend the winter well cared for by friends in Rochester, NY.
